name: Graveyard Smash
description: Graveyard Smash is a tongue in cheek, small, retro-style, skill-based action game in which you play the protagonist Manuel Rodriguez, the main groundskeeper of a local cemetery. Each night Manuel will run around on a randomly generated map using his shovel to smash the ever growing number of Undead back into the grave and prohibit the...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.8 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 200 series or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Any
